languages.text: Растение покрыто пульсирующими фиолетовыми пятнами. Молодые побеги уже покрыты похожими отметинами — свидетельством явной мутации, а не болезни.

traits.locale_text: Некоторые части растения выглядят так, словно отросли совсем недавно.

languages.text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.
languages.original_text: Растение покрыто пульсирующими фиолетовыми пятнами. Молодые побеги уже покрыты похожими отметинами — свидетельством явной мутации, а не болезни.

traits.locale_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.
The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.
The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.
The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.
The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

languages.text: 这株植物上的紫色斑点一跳一跳的，刚长出来的嫩芽上也布满了类似的痕迹。很显然，这并不是染了病，而是变异导致的。
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: 这株植物上的紫色斑点一跳一跳的，刚长出来的嫩芽上也布满了类似的痕迹。很显然，这并不是染了病，而是变异导致的。

languages.text: La planta está cubierta de pústulas moradas palpitantes. Los brotes jóvenes también muestran las mismas marcas: se trata de una mutación, no una enfermedad.
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: La planta está cubierta de pústulas moradas palpitantes. Los brotes jóvenes también muestran las mismas marcas: se trata de una mutación, no una enfermedad.

languages.text: この植物は、明滅する紫色の斑点で覆われている。新芽にもすでに似たような印が発生していることから、明らかに突然変異のサインであって病気ではない。
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: この植物は、明滅する紫色の斑点で覆われている。新芽にもすでに似たような印が発生していることから、明らかに突然変異のサインであって病気ではない。

languages.text: Die Pflanze ist bedeckt mit pulsierenden, violetten Flecken. Junge Triebe weisen bereits ähnliche Markierungen auf – eindeutig eine Mutation, keine Krankheit.
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: Die Pflanze ist bedeckt mit pulsierenden, violetten Flecken. Junge Triebe weisen bereits ähnliche Markierungen auf – eindeutig eine Mutation, keine Krankheit.

languages.text: La plante est couverte de taches violettes palpitantes. Au vu des jeunes pousses qui portent déjà des marques similaires, il s'agit clairement d'un signe de mutation et non de maladie.
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: La plante est couverte de taches violettes palpitantes. Au vu des jeunes pousses qui portent déjà des marques similaires, il s'agit clairement d'un signe de mutation et non de maladie.

languages.text: Bitki, titreşen mor noktalarla kaplı. Küçük filizler de şimdiden aynı işaretlerle kaplanmış durumda. Kaynağının bir hastalık değil de mutasyon olduğu çok belli.
languages.original_text: The plant is covered in pulsating purple spots. Young shoots are already covered in similar marks — clearly a sign of mutation, not a disease.

traits.locale_text: Bitki, titreşen mor noktalarla kaplı. Küçük filizler de şimdiden aynı işaretlerle kaplanmış durumda. Kaynağının bir hastalık değil de mutasyon olduğu çok belli.
